data.title: Spirit Halloween Stores Opening In Shreveport, East Texas
data.meta_description: Halloween season is officially here as Spirit Halloween is officially open in Shreveport, Monroe and East Texas.
data.text:
With all these 100 degree days and brutal heat, I think most of us are officially done with summer. Well, while fall temps haven't moved into the area yet, one fall staple is up and running: Spirit Halloween.

Whether you want to get an early jump on your costume, just do some window shopping or get into the spooky spirit, several area Spirit Halloween stores are officially open in North Louisiana & East Texas.

Where Will Spirit Stores be Located in Shreveport, Monroe & East Texas?

I guess if there's one 'downside' to Spirit Halloween is that they are rarely in the same locations 2 years in a row. Most are only open a few months out of the year and move into different retail locations every year, depending on what properties are available and other factors.

The good news is that Spirit is pretty good about keeping customers updated on where stores are and when they'll open.

According to the Spirit website, here's where stores are located and when they'll be opening. Note that some locations are marked 'Opens August' without a specific date, so there's not a clear date or time on when these locations will be up and running.
